feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Hi Experts,I need your guidance. We are working in SAP Public Cloud and this is related to MM
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
I need your guidance. We are working in SAP Public Cloud and our full production process has not yet been implemented. I want to update SFG stock at each production stage, showing the transfer from one material to another along with the quantity and any process loss.

I initially considered using a material-to-material transfer (309 movement). However, the challenge is that I need system-generated batches for both Material A and Material B during the 309 movement, because the batch classification characteristics (size, grade, tolerance, etc.) differ between input and output materials.

Is there any alternative way to manage stage-wise inventory updates besides using 309 movement? until our production process is fully implemented.
Thanks in advance for your valuable inputs.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud Transportation Management
entry.content:
Hi all — I understand that SAP Public Cloud TM doesn’t support third-party sales order processing scope items. I’m trying to find a workaround and attempted to create a freight document via the inbound delivery linked to the 3rd party purchase order. However, the system is not generating the freight document.

 

Has anyone encountered this scenario before? If so, please share your insights.

entry.title: How do I change the item type text?
entry.content:
Dear experts,
I would like to change the text of the standard item type provided in the public cloud. Is this possible? If so, where can I change it?
SSCUI:103539 was grayed out even when I pressed "Edit" and could not be changed.

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud Custom RF verification
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Please suggest if it is possible to add a custom verification logic for one of the fields on RF(example : product - decode product number from a suppliers barcode - barcode consists of other fields as well, not just product).

Regards,

Shashi

entry.title: Unable to Use ZCDS or Any Standard CDS View in AMDP Table Function
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud  and trying to consume a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function.

However, I am getting the following error during activation: Please see the below Screenshots.

The object DDLS I_PRODUCTIONORDEROPCOMPONENTTP must not be used here, because it is not released for usage in AMDP methods.

Questions:

  1. How can we use a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function in Public Cloud?

  2. How can we release objects from C1 to C4?

  3. Is there any workaround, as this is urgent?

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud – Dunning Notice Email to Customer + Multiple Contact Persons from BP
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL) and are trying to configure Dunning Notice emails so that email IDs are picked dynamically from BP master data, without hardcoding email addresses.

Requirement

When a dunning run is executed:

Email should be sent to the Customer BP email

Email should also be sent to all linked Contact Persons’ email IDs

Multiple Contact Persons should receive the email automatically

All email IDs must be derived only from BP master (Customer + Contact Person)

What we have already configured

  1. BP Master

Customer BP has email maintained in Address → Communication

Contact Person BPs have email maintained

Relationships maintained: Has Contact Person, Has Dunning Recipient

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Receiver

Application: Dunning

Determination Step: Receiver

Decision Table: DT_RECEIVER

Entry maintained:

Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE

Account Type = D (Customer) Role = D Exclusive Indicator = false

Note: We do not see CP (Contact Person) as a selectable Role in Receiver.

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Email Recipient

Determination Step: Email Recipient

Decision Table: DT_EMAIL_RECEIVER

Entries maintained:

Row 1: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE,  Email Type = TO, Email Address = Context → Customer → Email Address

Row 2: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE, Email Type = TO Email Address = Context → Contact Person → Email Address

 

Issue / Clarification Required

CP (Contact Person) does not appear as a Role in Receiver determination

It is unclear whether Contact Persons are implicitly derived during Email Recipient determination

Despite maintaining BP relationships and Email Recipient context mapping, the behavior is not clearly documented

Questions

  1. In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it standard behavior that Contact Persons are not selectable in the Receiver Role?
  2. Is the above configuration sufficient for sending dunning emails to:
    1. Customer BP email, and
    2. All Contact Person emails marked as Dunning Recipient?
  3. Is there any additional configuration or prerequisite required for Contact Person email determination?
  4. Is there any SAP documentation or note confirming this behavior?

entry.title: Regarding to method of add items to Search Helps.
entry.content:
Dear  All.

I want to add Items to Search Help.

For examples, Search Term2, custom fields, etc.

So, please let me know how to add items to Search Helps.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Mass Maintenance of Tax classification
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i have the following issue. During the migration of customers, the information for the tax classification was filled incorrectly into the migration template and migrated with the migration cockpit
All entries consist of a country code, the tax category (mainly TTX1) and the tax classification (1 or 0). 
Because of an human error, many entries have a variety of country codes, when they all should only have one specific country code.
As a result none of these entries are displayed in the app "manage business partner master data" under the sales area section.

If i manually edit those business partners, i can add an entry with the correct country code, that overwrites the wrong entry that is not visible.
So far i have looked into the mass maintenance tool, but there i can only change the tax classification to a different value, but not the country code, which is the incorrect entry.
I also looked into the app "mass import of business partner master data", but there i get a message that the fields i want to import (correct) are alread filled.

The table that contains this data is called "KNVI".

My question is, is there way to do this correction in mass ? Can i update these entries with the migration cockpit or did i miss another option ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Warehouse Physical Inventory document creation, unable to change data in field.
entry.content:
Hi SAP team,

We are trying to create physical inventory document in warehouse management using the app Create Inventory Documents - Physical Inventory (SCWM/PI_DOC_CREATE). Here by default the blocking indicator is marked as X i.e. has been enabled and is unable to edit it. likewise the freeze inventory indicator is also not changeable. is it a standard system behavior or is there any settings or configurations missing from our side? please guide. 

Best Regards,

entry.title: Story creation error on Manage KPIs and Reports app
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are unable to create a new story on "Manage KPIs and Reports" app on S/4HANA Public cloud system ver 2508.

When we open "Manage KPIs and Reports" app and then move to "Stories"

then, create a story, we receive the below warning message.

"Story contains default configuration. Review the configuration before activation"

"It seems that you don't have an active account

Please contact your system administrator and ensure you have an active account on this system."
 
Could you kindly help resolve these so that we are able to create a story?
 
Kind Regards,
Fujita

entry.title: Customer Return(A2X) API and In-House Repair API Combination of any another API is available?
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Good Day!

Is there any API available that combines Customer Return API and In-House Repair?

Overview | Customer Return (A2X) | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

Try Out | In-House Repair | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

I have checked the APIs and found no relationship between the two. Could you please provide details of a combination API, any relationship information, or release CDS views.

Regards,

Srini.

entry.title: Intra company billing setup in sap public cloud
entry.content:

Currently, We don't have the intra-company billing setup in the system. eg: IN12 Intra-company billing setups.(Billing from TN to KA or KA to TN)

We should be able to determine based on the plant code, INP1 or INP2, when we select the customer's name.

Is there any configuration documents or help portal link to work on this.

It will be helpful for new setup.

Thanks,

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud ERP (public) - Nielsen ID for Business Partner
entry.content:
Hi all,

since we have a Two-Tier scenario with a Business Partner Replication from ECC to S/4HANA Public Cloud, we must maintain the Nielsen indicator (Marketing Data in Business Partner). 

I cannot find the SSCUI to customize the Nielsen ID - the selection guide (F4) in Public Cloud is empty. 

How can the Nielsen indicator be maintained? 

Thanks and best regards

Katja

entry.title: Error When Generating DOC via “Run Statutory Reports” App
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

 

We are encountering an issue in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud when generating an Audit File (FEC) report when using the Run Statutory Reports app.
 
Description of the Problem: The client is unable to generate the desired report.
Each attempt ends with the following error message after some processing time: Generation failed.

 

Tests Performed

  • We performed the same execution on our test system, and the FEC was generated successfully without any errors.
  • However, the client continues to experience the error consistently on their side: “Échec de la génération”

Request for Support / Insights

Has anyone already encountered this issue with the Run Statutory Reports application, specifically when generating the FEC?

Any guidance or feedback would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your help!

SAP S/4HANA Embedded Analytics  SAP Audit Management FIN Controlling SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Finance

entry.title: Connecting SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud with Microsoft PowerBI using OAuth2.0
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

I am trying to establish a connection between SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and Microsoft Power BI using OAuth2.0 as the authentication method. I am using the standard communication scenario SAP_COM_0053, which according to the documentation supports OAuth 2.0. The connection is set up via an OData Feed in Power BI. However, I am unable to get the “Organizational Account” sign-in option working in Power BI.

Errors encountered

  • Power BI Desktop:
    “The WWW-Authenticate header doesn't contain a valid authorization URL.”
  • Power BI Service (Cloud):
    “Failed to login with OAuth token. Please try logging in again.”

Additional context

  • I previously created a custom communication arrangement using Basic Authentication, which works without any issues.
  • Our Dev and Test tenants use SAP Profile Management (SSO via SAP Identity Authentication Service).

Question
Has anyone successfully connected Power BI directly to SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud using OAuth? If so:

  • Are there specific prerequisites or configuration steps required?
  • Is SAP IAS officially supported for OAuth authentication with Power BI?
  • Is this a known limitation of Power BI’s OAuth implementation?

Any insights, confirmations, or recommended approaches would be highly appreciated!

Kind regards,

Mike van Ingen
Finance

entry.title: Extra licence for Scope Item 1RK?
entry.content:
Hello

We would like to use scope Item 1RK for our Public Cloud Customer. Does it require a extra licence? Thanks in advance, Melanie

entry.title: Quantity Distribution settings
entry.content:
Hello,

We use the quantity distribution as described in https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-sap/quantity-distribution/ba-p/13685342 to distribute the receipt of goods, allowing them to be committed using the ATP check. However, we see that the configuration of this feature is not as we expect it to be. Currently, the quantity is distributed over the horizon that is between the planned start and the planned end. The slack that we build in between the scheduled start and the planned start is not taken into account in this. The desired situation is that the quantity is distributed between the scheduled start and the planned end, taking into account the GR Proc. Time.

Is there any Customizing that we can do to create the situation that we desire instead of the presented situation. We work in SAP s4 Hana cloud.

 

Looking forward to your answer!

 

Best regards,

Lars

entry.title: Automatic Payment Run Identification in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Each automatic payment run generates a unique identifier for the proposal. Is this code stored in the accounting document of the payment so that it allows tracking which invoices were cleared?

When reconciling the payment, I cannot find any identification that stores the batch of automatic payments to be able to search for it.

In other words, I would like to know if the system stores the batch number or any identifier in the accounting entries of automatic payments to facilitate the search and reconciliation of remittances with multiple invoices.

Does anyone know anything about this?

entry.title: Significant Performance Degradation in SAP BPA UI Automation Steps when Targeting SAP HANA Cloud UI
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We are experiencing a sudden and severe slowdown in our SAP Build Process Automation bots that interact with our SAP HANA Cloud web interface. All UI-related activities (e.g., Click, Set Element, Get Element) are executing extremely slowly, taking 10-20 times longer than usual. However, non-UI automation activities within the same project (such as Excel operations, file system activities, and loops) are executing at normal speed. The issue is strictly confined to the interaction between the BPA agent and the target web application.

Please provide your suggestions and insights on this issue we are facing.

Thanks in advance

entry.title: SAP Screen Personas – Control Personas Button Visibility Based on RF Screen Field Value
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud – EWM RF Environment and using SAP Screen Personas to enhance an RF screen.

I have added a custom Personas push button (Print HU) on an RF screen, but when i made the custom flavor default i could see this custom button on each screen of this application as below

The requirement is to show this button only when “GR Posted” = X on the same RF screen.
Screen details
• RF screen program: /SCWM/SAPL_RF_RECEIVING_HUS
• Screen: 0501
• Field GR Posted is a display-only text field, captured via recording as:
wnd[0]/usr/subx:/SCWM/SAPL_RF_RECEIVING_HUS:0501/txt/SCWM/S_RF_REHU_HU-PGR
• Custom Personas button technical ID (from recording):
wnd[0]/usr/btnPersonas_XXXXXXXXXXXX

What I tried
In the onLoad Personas script, I am reading the value of the GR Posted text field and toggling the button visibility

My questions
1. Is this the correct and supported approach in Screen Personas to control visibility of a Personas button based on a display-only RF field?
2. Is there a recommended best practice to Custom button visibility/ Custom persona flavor applicability based on existing screen field values
3. Any limitations or risks in S/4HANA Public Cloud RF environments I should be aware of when using this approach?

System Information
• SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
• EWM RF Environment
• SAP Screen Personas (Flavor & Scripts)

Thanks in advance.

Phani Deepthi A
